name: USING VODKA
body:
### [VODKA connecting Indexes](http://www.sai.msu.su/~megera/postgres/talks/highload-2014-vodka.pdf),Highload 2014, Moscow, Oct 31, 2014.

### [CREATE INDEX ... USING VODKA. An efficient indexing of nested structures](http://www.pgcon.org/2014/schedule/events/696.en.html), [Slides](http://www.sai.msu.su/~megera/postgres/talks/pgcon-2014-vodka.pdf), PGCon-2014, May 22, 2014, Ottawa, Canada.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
